channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: $14 billion in clean energy projects have been canceled in the US this year, analysis says
item.description: A new analysis finds that more than $14 billion in clean energy projects in the U.S. have been canceled this year.

item.title: It’s not a reprint. Why Sacred Harp singers are revamping an iconic pre-Civil War hymnal
Cambodian American chefs are finding success and raising their culture’s profile. On their terms
